visuals.title: Ft Analysis Integral
visuals.description: Visual representation for Fourier Transform Definition and Examples.

traces.y_expr: Array.from({length: 400}, (_, i) => { const t = -4 + i * 8 / 400; return Math.exp(-Math.abs(t)) * Math.cos(2*t); })
traces.name: ft analysis integral
